name: Traitify-js
body:
Traitify.js =============== This package does not require jQuery, as it is a standalone encapsulated library. It does however require a browser with the ability to make cors requests (currently only supports ie10 and up, chrome, safari, and firefox). ### Running, Building, Testing and Bundling: ```Shell $ cake watch $ cake build $ cake bundle $ cake test ``` ### Using Traitify JS: The CDN can be found at: ```HTML+ERB ``` How to initialize: ```HTML
``` When you initialize the widget we return our widget builder to you (This is the same builder we use to construct the widget). ```HTML ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
